hibernate-mapping.query: FROM Jb j WHERE j.rx LIKE :ordenParam AND UPPER(j.cliente) LIKE UPPER(:clienteParam) AND j.estado.idEdo NOT IN ('TE','CN','BD') AND j.jbTipo = 'OS' ORDER BY j.fechaPromesa DESC
FROM Jb j WHERE j.rx LIKE :ordenParam AND UPPER(j.cliente) LIKE UPPER(:clienteParam) AND j.jbTipo = 'OS' ORDER BY j.fechaPromesa DESC
SELECT COUNT (*) FROM Jb j WHERE j.rx LIKE :ordenParam AND UPPER(j.cliente) LIKE UPPER(:clienteParam) AND j.jbTipo = 'OS'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Jb j WHERE j.rx LIKE :ordenParam AND UPPER(j.cliente) LIKE UPPER(:clienteParam) AND j.estado.idEdo NOT IN ('TE','CN','BD') AND j.jbTipo = 'OS'

FROM Cliente c WHERE UPPER(c.apellidoPatCli) LIKE UPPER(:apPaternoParam) AND UPPER(c.apellidoMatCli) LIKE UPPER(:apMaternoParam) AND UPPER(c.nombreCli) LIKE UPPER(:nombreParam) AND c.municipio.id.idEstado is not null AND c.municipio.id.idLocalidad is not null AND c.municipio.id.idEstado != '' AND c.municipio.id.idLocalidad != '' ORDER BY c.apellidoPatCli
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Cliente c WHERE UPPER(c.apellidoPatCli) LIKE UPPER(:apPaternoParam) AND UPPER(c.apellidoMatCli) LIKE UPPER(:apMaternoParam) AND UPPER(c.nombreCli) LIKE UPPER(:nombreParam)
FROM Jb j WHERE j.rx LIKE :ordenParam AND UPPER(j.cliente) LIKE UPPER(:clienteParam) ORDER BY j.fechaPromesa DESC
